events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle and a traffic pole on April 30th at approximately 6 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after initial assessment of the incident details and vehicle involved.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the claim and to guide the claimant through the process efficiently.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and confirmation sent to the claimant with next steps outlined.
The agent requested photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim review.
All requested documents, including photos and the official police report, were submitted by the claimant on time.
The investigation team has begun their examination of the submitted evidence and vehicle condition.
Investigation determined that the vehicle damage correlates with the insured accident details and is covered by policy.
A settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and related fees has been proposed to the claimant for approval.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the quick handling.
The claim has been approved by the insurer following acceptance of settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment covering vehicle repair costs was successfully issued to the claimant via bank transfer.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and payment was received.
All documentation and case files for this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
